data.title: EDMUND “ED” BAUER
data.meta_description: Father of Michael Bauer and wife Denise, Mark Bauer and wife Nancy, and Matthew Bauer and wife Kim Grandfather of Maigon Bauer, Victoria Bauer, Shelton Bauer, Tyler Bauer, Brayden Bauer, Zachary Bauer, Wesley Bauer, and Madison Bauer Great Grandfather of Kyndrah Bauer Special Family Member, Jamie Rodriguez Brother of Louise Stadler, Joyce Swift, Evelyn Thomas, and the late James “Sonny” Bauer
data.text:
Father of Michael Bauer and wife Denise, Mark Bauer and wife Nancy, and Matthew Bauer and wife Kim Grandfather of Maigon Bauer, Victoria Bauer, Shelton Bauer, Tyler Bauer, Brayden Bauer, Zachary Bauer, Wesley Bauer, and Madison Bauer Great Grandfather of Kyndrah Bauer Special Family Member, Jamie Rodriguez Brother of Louise Stadler, Joyce Swift, Evelyn Thomas, and the late James “Sonny” Bauer and the late Lillian Seymour

BORN: November 27, 1949

DIED: August 20, 2015

AGE: 65 years 8 months 24 days

Ed entered eternal rest Thursday at 12:51 P.M., at Methodist Hospital in San Antonio, Texas.

Visitation for Ed will begin at 5:00 P.M. Monday, August 24, 2015, at Vinyard Funeral Home Chapel in Floresville, Texas, and after 9:30 A.M. Tuesday, at the Church.

ROSARY: 7:00 P.M. Monday, August 24, 2015, at

Vinyard Funeral Home Chapel in Floresville, Texas.

FUNERAL SERVICE: 10:30 A.M. Mass, Tuesday,

August 25, 2015, at Blessed Sacrament Catholic Church

in Poth, Texas.

INTERMENT: Harper Cemetery in Wilson County, Texas.
